name: Attack Angry Monster
description:
There is a evil monster，tricking people everyday and everywhere，take much trouble to residents. In order to keep peaceful life，we must not let it succeed！
let's take props and take part in this battle，whether it's a gun, a cannon or a sword, or even a fly swatter. Kick the monster heavily，let it never dare to tease people .Every time you beat monster ,will update its level，the higher level，the stronger the monster. We need keep tapping monster constantly to earn more golds，and purchase best props，only do like this，can we better defeat it！

Game features：
Release stress game, bring a good mood!
Daily gift, login to receive a luxury reward!
